descriptions: ["DescriptionPartial Lake & SZR ViewHigh FloorRented at 122K till May 2020Service Fees 19.63/sq.ft.Furnished\nThis is a fully furnished two bedroom apartment in Green Lakes Tower 1, Jumeirah Lake Towers, combining stunning views. This apartment has spacious rooms, a good size balcony, wardrobes, a fully equipped kitchen, two bathrooms and it is beautifully furnished with excellent quality furniture. The development's international design and exclusive architecture make it extremely desirable.  This exquisitely designed high-rise tower comprises of stylish, and classical residential units, promises a life of comfort and style. Excellent value and convenience for those moving to Dubai not wishing to purchase furniture. Jumeirah Lakes Towers or JLT as it is commonly known is built around three lakes while the 4th, Lake Zafeer, has been turned into a beautiful park. There is a sense of community within JLT for families, couples and singles made possible by the walking and jogging tracks around the lakes, play areas for children.Please call us now for more information!"]

['DescriptionIrani Udowita from First Gulf Platinum Properties proudly presents this immaculate perfect family home to the market in popular Oliva Village, Victory Heights.
Description:
* Independent villa
*5 bedroom + 5 bathrooms + Maids room
* Covered 2 parking with garage
* Built up area 3464 sqft
* Plot size 6750 sqft 
* Selling Price - AED 3,200,000
This amazing C2 villa is in huge plot covered with matured garden which overlooks a lovely Oliva two parks.
This perfect family home comprises downstairs of two large living rooms with separate dining area. A specious modern fully equipped kitchen comes with appliances with one en suite. 
First floor opens to master bedroom and one en suite together with modern bathroom, fitted wardrobes and dressing area with direct access to the large terrace. The remaining bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and bathroom.
Victory Heights is a popular gated community built around the Ernie Els designed golf course. The community is largely made up of lots of green open space with parks in most of the villages for residents to enjoy.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionFirst Gulf Platinum Properties Real Estate Broker Irani Udowita proudly present this type C3 - 4 bedrooms residential villa in Victory Heights to the market for sale. This beautiful family home located in popular Esmeralda village and is in excellent condition.
Property Features:
* 4 Bedroom + Maids room
* Open kitchen with appliances
* Dining area
* Large reception room
* Spacious outdoor area 
* 2 car parking
* BUA: 3,201 sqft
* Backing greenery
* Immaculate condition 
* Quiet location
* Vacant
It is an amazing 4-bedroom family home should be viewed to fully appreciate all it has to offer. The property is in very good condition and outside is the right place for family entertainment & leisure. The location of this villa is also close to the community pool and gym.
Ground floor opens to living and dining area, a second reception area and an open plan kitchen. There is also a guest bedroom on the ground floor with an en-suite. 
The first floor opens three double bedrooms, one with an en suite and the other two sharing a family bathroom. All the upstairs bedrooms also benefit from extra fitted wardrobes.
Victory Heights is a popular gated community built around the Ernie Els-designed golf course. The community is largely made up of lots of green open space with parks in most of the villages for residents to enjoy. 
There are over 4 entrances and exits that lead to the three major road networks of Al Khail, Hessa Street and Sheikh Mohammad Bin Zayed Road so access in and out of the community is easy.']

['DescriptionBerkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties is delighted to present this Villa situated on the prestigious Emirates Hills. This is a double plot with two existing Villas. Nestled in a private location at the end of a cul-de-sac with full golf course views and the Dubai skyline beyond. These Villas can be considered as a refurbishment project for a discerning buyer.
Offering a combined eleven bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, multiple living areas and multiple kitchens. In one of the Villas there is a dedicated home movie theatre room located on the first floor that comes fitted with an acoustic interior. The reception and living rooms are extra-large and have an easy and free flow between them. A separate study leads off the front entrance hall and can be a multi-purpose room. One of the Villas has a lift between the floors. A striking chandelier compliments the entrance hall.
The property has a large garden with a perfect sized pool and landscaped garden further complimented by a separate gazebo that provides an additional and private entertainment area.
Separate dedicated study. Parking for multiple cars. Maid’s room and driver’s room with en-suite bathroom. Plot size 40,623 sq. ft.
FEATURES:
- Cul De Sac
- Double Plot
- Total of 11 Bedrooms
- Plot size 40,623 sq. ft.
- Entertainment Room
- Lift Available
- Private Pool
- Fully Landscaped Garden
Call our Emirates Hills Specialist on +971504127168 or visit www. berkshirehathawayhomeservicesgp.com to find out more.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate is excited to offer to the market a coveted 5 bedplus maid’s room villa in Flame Tree Ridge. It is one of the communities closest to the Jumeirah Golf Estates clubhouse. Like most other communities within Jumeirah Golf Estates most villas have golf-course views. This community also has several water-features (small ponds/lakes) which is more unique in this community. 
The villa is nestled in a BUA of 5,574 sq. ft with Plot Area of 7,480 sq.ft plus more additional plot area of 803 sq.ft. The property offers the best of Italian countryside living with rich autumnal colour palettes of Tuscany, authentic stone facades, pitched terracotta roofs, private landscaped gardens and swimming pool.
It also comes with architectural styles and colour schemes with smart home systems, lighting, access control systems and electric golf carts.
For arranged viewings pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or for more details and images of the property, visit our website at www.tnh.ae.']
